title.rendered: “Decisive IDF Operations: Eliminating Terror Threats and Seizing Weapons in Khan Yunis and the Zaytun Neighborhood”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces eliminated dozens of terrorists in combat in the past day: 98th Division forces continue to eliminate terrorists and locate weapons in Khan Yunis. 162nd Division forces are operating in the Zaytun neighborhood; fighters of Unit 414 closed in and directed an aircraft that eliminated a terrorist who fired at our forces in Khan Yunis.

The Southern Command’s fire center and the Air Force attacked eight significant targets in the area from which a rocket was fired at Ashkelon last night and subsequently, blew up terror infrastructures from which terrorists came out to commit terror acts in the Strip.

The combat team of the 7th Brigade raided buildings in west Khan Yunis and located war materials and military equipment. The fighters eliminated five terrorists by precisely firing a missile at the vehicle they were traveling in. In addition, combat planes attacked two military buildings and eliminated terrorists who were in them.

Paratrooper Brigade combat team fighters killed several terrorists by sniper fire.

Combat team fighters of the Givati Brigade identified two terrorists and, closing in with the brigade’s fire system, they were killed by an airstrike.

Fire center of the 98th Division directed a combat plane to attack terrorists who were laying an ambush against our forces in a military building in the Khan Yunis area. Secondary explosions identified after the attack testified to the many weapons they had in their possession.

In the center of the Strip, the fighters of the 162nd Division continue to operate in the Zaytun neighborhood. Fighters of the Nahal Brigade’s combat team killed several terrorists during the last day and located war materials in the area. In one of the operations, the fighters on the ground identified a cell of terrorists and killed them by an attack of a combat helicopter.

Attached is documentation of the elimination of the terrorist who fired at our forces, directed by Unit 414: https://bit.ly/3SYuEul

Attached is documentation of the IDF forces operating in the Strip: https://bit.ly/49NYjwU

Photos from the forces’ activities are attached: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC28022024.28915617

Attached is footage of IDF attacks in the Strip area: https://bit.ly/42T2plh
